text: Rolf Ernst Gohs (26 October 1933 – 23 August 2020) was an Estonian-born Swedish comic creator. He was born in Estonia but moved to Sweden in 1946. Gohs usually wrote his own stories as well. Early works such as Mannen från Claa (The Man from Claa) and Dödens Fågel (The Bird of Death) were well received. He produced a comic book story about the legendary Children's Crusade directly for the Swedish Phantom comic book. Gohs died on 23 August 2020, aged 86.Phantom Cover Artist Rolf Gohs Has Passed Away ==References== Category:1933 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Estonian writers Category:Swedish writers Category:Comics artists
title: Rolf Gohs
